pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial and Spatio-Temporal Bayesian Model for Circular Data // Implementation of Bayesian models for spatial and spatio- temporal interpolation of circular data using Gaussian Wrapped and Gaussian Projected distributions. We developed the methods described in Jona Lasinio G. et al. (2012) doi: 10.1214/12-aoas576, Wang F. et al. (2014) doi: 10.1080/01621459.2014.934454 and Mastrantonio G. et al. (2016) doi: 10.1007/s11749-015-0458-y.
